VEC.Q: How many series are represented in this area chart?

SRP.Q: What is the vertical (above/below) relationship of the area representing Whispering Willows Estate relative to Misty Meadow Acres?
SRP.A: Whispering Willows Estate is {below} Misty Meadow Acres in the vertical direction.

VPR.Q: Which series contributes the largest portion to the total crop yield?
VPR.A: The series with the largest contribution is {Ironwood Ranch}.

VPR.Q: Which series contributes the smallest portion to the total crop yield?
VPR.A: The series with the smallest contribution is {Sunstone Farms}.

VE.Q: What is Sunstone Farms's Crop Yield in 2004?
VE.A: Sunstone Farms's crop yield in 2004 is {72989.83} tons/hectare.

VE.Q: What is Ironwood Ranch's Crop Yield in 2003?
VE.A: Ironwood Ranch's crop yield in 2003 is {124479.90} tons/hectare.

VE.Q: What is Starfall Organics's Crop Yield in 2005?
VE.A: Starfall Organics's crop yield in 2005 is {67765.97} tons/hectare.

VE.Q: What are the crop yield of Misty Meadow Acres, Ironwood Ranch, and Sunstone Farms in 2001?
VE.A: Misty Meadow Acres's crop yield is {99466.82} tons/hectare, Ironwood Ranch's crop yield is {103524.25} tons/hectare, Sunstone Farms's crop yield is {98686.39} tons/hectare.

EVJ.Q: What is the global minimum Crop Yield in the area chart?
EVJ.A: The global minimum crop yield is {63462.00} tons/hectare.

EVJ.Q: What is the global maximum Crop Yield in the area chart?
EVJ.A: The global maximum crop yield is {129318.63} tons/hectare.

EVJ.Q: What is the highest Crop Yield level recorded for Ironwood Ranch?
EVJ.A: Ironwood Ranch reached approximately {129318.63} tons/hectare in {2004}.

EVJ.Q: What is the lowest Crop Yield level recorded for Ironwood Ranch?
EVJ.A: Ironwood Ranch's lowest recorded level is approximately {103524.25} tons/hectare in {2001}.

SC.Q: What is the average total Crop Yield?
SC.A: The average total crop yield is {459806.48} tons/hectare.

NF.Q: Which years did the total Crop Yield fall between 437181.55 and 483200.66 tons/hectare? Please list the years and corresponding total values.
Which years did the total Crop Yield go below 442202.96 tons/hectare? Please list the years and corresponding total values.
Which years did the total Crop Yield exceed 478179.25 tons/hectare? Please list the years and corresponding total values.

NC.Q: Between 2002 and 2005, was the average total Crop Yield higher or lower than between 2001 and 2002?
NC.A: The average total crop yield between 2002 and 2005 was {lower} than between 2001 and 2002.

NC.Q: Between 2003 and 2004, was the average total Crop Yield higher or lower than between 2004 and 2005?
NC.A: The average total crop yield between 2003 and 2004 was {higher} than between 2004 and 2005.

NC.Q: Between 2001 and 2004, was the average total Crop Yield higher or lower than between 2002 and 2003?
NC.A: The average total crop yield between 2001 and 2004 was {lower} than between 2002 and 2003.

NC.Q: Between 2002 and 2003, was the average total Crop Yield higher or lower than between 2004 and 2005?
NC.A: The average total crop yield between 2002 and 2003 was {higher} than between 2004 and 2005.

MSR.Q: Which series has the largest cumulative area in this area chart?
MSR.A: {Ironwood Ranch} has the largest cumulative area.

VA.Q: To reduce the 'waving' visual effect in the area chart, reorder the layers by end value and list the labels from top to bottom after sorting.
VA.A: The reordered layer order from top to bottom is: {Sunstone Farms, Starfall Organics, Misty Meadow Acres, Whispering Willows Estate, Ironwood Ranch}.
